monster.name: Brown Bear

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 319, Princes of the Apocalypse, Storm King's Thunder, Tales from the Yawning Portal, Ghosts of Saltmarsh, Infernal Machine Rebuild, Mythic Odysseys of Theros, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
